name: Massimo Scaccabarozzi
subtitle: President of Farmindustria | President of Janssen Italia | Head of External Affairs Johnson & Johnson Italia
about: Massimo Scaccabarozzi has a degree in Pharmacy.He is Chairman of Janssen Italy, the pharmaceutical division of the Johnson & Johnson Group. Janssen has approximately 1300 employees and has been present in Italy since 1995, with headquarters in Milan and a production plant in Latina. He is also Head of External Affairs Johnson & Johnson Italia and President of Farmindustria, the Italian Association of Pharmaceutical Companies and President of the Johnson & Johnson Foundation, which in 20 years of charitable activities has distributed contributions for approximately € 15 million in Italy. Confirming his commitment to social welfare, he is also the frontman of the "JC Band" composed by employees of Janssen Italy. The JC Band has been performing charity rock concerts in Italy and abroad for more than 10 years.
